name: ReactNativeMoEngage
description: MoEngage is a mobile marketing automation company. This react-native SDK helps you track events, trigger smart notifications and in-apps, provides a drop-in Inbox Controller for notifications.
summary: A React Native plugin for implementation of MoEngage-iOS-SDK.
prepare_command:
echo // Generated file, do not edit > iOS/MoEReactBridge/MoEngageReactPluginInfo.h
echo "#define MOE_REACT_PLUGIN_VERSION @\"8.1.1\"" >> iOS/MoEReactBridge/MoEngageReactPluginInfo.h
